thread.title: Snow-day at the Tuscany!
thread.title_full: Snow-day at the Tuscany! - Review of The Tuscany - A St Giles Signature Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ashap393
title: Snow-day at the Tuscany!
text: Great location! Very clean. Reception staff at midnight just before the storm 'Stella' arrives, very welcoming. The bed was very comfortable! Breakfast was not available at the hotel and the restaurant did not open on the Tuesday! The hot water needed to be adjusted and on the first occasion someone came to assist, nothing was done, on the second an adjustment was made and everything was fine! All in all a great experience and will come again!
